author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Lupin in DDR?!
body:
I was playing Dance Dance Revolution 4th Mix(Arcade version), and I noticed 
the '78 mix of the Lupin theme song is in the game. Unfortunately, it's one 
of the tougher songs to dance to. ;-;
